Methods in br.octahedron.cotopaxi.controller that return ActionResponse
 ActionResponse ControllerManager.process(RequestWrapper request, MetadataHandler metadata)
          Checks the permissions for the given RequestWrapper/MetadataHandler, check format, execute the ModelController and return the SuccessActionResponse.
